message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9,000. I think it's a fair price considering its worth to you is $12,000. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  $9,000 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to get a bit closer to my budget.  I'd be happy to pay $8,500 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer! I understand you're trying to get closer to your budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll counteroffer at $8,800. It's a fair price considering the product's value to you is $12,000. Let me know if this works for you!
